Detailed Description

template<typename ExceptionType = broken_constraint>
struct boost::constrained_value::throw_exception< ExceptionType >

Error policy for constrained that throws an exception of ExceptionType.

Remarks:
ExceptionType must be DefaultConstructible and derive publicly from std::exception.

Throws the exception.
